If only the eraser work I'll give it a five star or four star it has lack 
of colors and the Eraser doesn't work so if you paint anything and you mess

I love this app! I have used it on every device since forever and it is my 
go-to photo editor app!

It's brilliant for colouring B&W photos I've used it for a few years now. 
It does take practice to get a good result however the app is called Photo 
"Art". Like any art work close up all you can see is brush strokes. This is 
a great app that's why I give it 5 stars.

Best app for adding effects to a specific part of a photo.  U can use brush mode to "paint" a selected effect anywhere on a photo.  If u want that cool out of focus background look, just select a blur effect and "paint" the areas u want to look out of focus.  If its confusing at first just keep play...Full ReviewBest app for adding effects to a specific part of a photo.  U can use brush mode to "paint" a selected effect anywhere on a photo.  If u want that cool out of focus background look, just select a blur effect and "paint" the areas u want to look out of focus.  If its confusing at first just keep playing with it and you'll figure it out.  Its not that complicated.
No intelligent design here. No easy color selection tool. You manually use a brush to paint on the alpha channel adding color back in or erasing color which can get tedious especially in small areas.

It's very hard to get into small places like around the face or body with out it affecting the picture. Like making the background black and white and make just the object just have color. Very confusing and not user friendly.
Great editing tool. The nearest thing is far behind. Really earns five stars. Small size but very capable. Good work.keep it up! (Please include crop in the next update.)

How does this work Not allowing me to choose a color and just apply to one part of picture.  No instructions,  confusing,  and works more in reverse which is stupid.    I do not recommend as there are many better apps out there.

I use this app with another photo editor app. This app is perfect for what I create. It's simple and easy to use. Should have more than 3.8 stars and if you're creative like I, you should have zero issue's with this application. Thank You for cresting this app!

It's Alright.. Converts the photo you choose to grayscale, then wherever you "paint" it applies the photo's original color to it. However, I reallt do believe the functions of the buttons could be improved for easier use and a more simplistic sort of design. This app has potential, it just needs to be brought out....Full ReviewConverts the photo you choose to grayscale, then wherever you "paint" it applies the photo's original color to it. However, I reallt do believe the functions of the buttons could be improved for easier use and a more simplistic sort of design. This app has potential, it just needs to be brought out. It does work, just a little tedious although.

I'm a professional wedding photographer and this would be great if you fixed this problem.

REDUCES THE RESOLUTION OF YOUR NEWLY CREATED PHOTO Drastically reduces quality of your photo to there garbage fixated 400x800 resolution no matter what resolution the original photo was. Until then I'm uninstalling and if others care about details a...Full ReviewDrastically reduces quality of your photo to there garbage fixated 400x800 resolution no matter what resolution the original photo was.
